description:
The One Intense Eau De Parfum - A Luxurious Masculine Statement

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce & Gabbana The One Intense, a sophisticated fragrance that embodies masculine elegance and charisma. This bestselling intense eau de parfum is meticulously crafted to leave a lasting impression with its rich, seductive composition. âœ¨

Product Information

Size 100ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration Intense EDP
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

The Olfactory Journey

Dive into a sensory experience with The One Intense, where every note is carefully balanced to create a symphony of masculine sophistication. ðŸ”¥

Top Notes Basil, Cypress, Cardamom
Heart Notes Amber, Clary Sage, Geranium
Base Notes Leather, Patchouli, Labdanum, Woody Notes

Key Features of The One Intense

  • ðŸ’Ž Long-lasting intensity that persists throughout the day
  • ðŸŒ¿ Rich, oriental composition with woody undertones
  • âœ¨ Perfect balance between fresh top notes and warm base accords
  • ðŸ”¥ Sophisticated amber and leather foundation for masculine depth
  • ðŸ’« Elegant glass bottle with luxurious gold detailing

The Legacy of The One Collection

Launched as an intensified version of the iconic Dolce & Gabbana The One fragrance, The One Intense EDP represents the evolution of masculine elegance. Created by renowned perfumer Olivier Polge, this new arrival in the collection amplifies the original's charisma with deeper, more resonant notes. The fragrance embodies the modern man who is confident, sophisticated, and unapologetically masculine.

When to Wear The One Intense

This intense masculine fragrance is versatile enough for various occasions but truly shines during evening events and special occasions. Its warm, spicy character makes it particularly suitable for fall and winter wear, though its sophisticated composition can be appreciated year-round. The perfect companion for the man who wants to make a memorable impression. âœ¨

Frequently Asked Question

How long does The One Intense Eau De Parfum last on skin?

The One Intense EDP offers exceptional longevity compared to the original fragrance, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The higher concentration of fragrance oils creates a more persistent scent trail, while the amber and leather base notes act as natural fixatives that extend wear time. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin, and consider layering with other products from The One collection. ðŸ”¥
